SEARCH
Package com.example.tundra_snow_app.Models

Class Notifications

java.lang.Object
com.example.tundra_snow_app.Models.Notifications
public class Notifications extends Object
Represents a notification in the Tundra Snow app. Notifications are associated with an event and are sent to a list of users, containing details such as the event name, notification type, and status for each user.

  • Constructor Details

    • Notifications

      public Notifications()
      No-argument constructor (required by Firestore).

    • Notifications

      public Notifications(String notificationID, List<String> userIDs, String eventID, String eventName, String text, String notificationType, Map<String,Boolean> userStatus)
      Constructor for the Users class. Initializes the user's properties.
      Parameters:
      notificationID - ID of notification
      userIDs - List of IDs of users notifications are being pushed to
      eventID - ID of event notification is from
      eventName - Name of event notification is from
      text - Notification text
      notificationType - Type of notification
      userStatus - Whether notification sent is new or not for all users in userIDs

  • Method Details

    • getUserStatus

      public Map<String,Boolean> getUserStatus()
      Retrieves the user status map, indicating whether the notification is new for each user.
      Returns:
      A map where keys are user IDs and values are booleans (true if new, false otherwise).

    • setUserStatus

      public void setUserStatus(Map<String,Boolean> userStatus)
      Sets the user status map for the notification.
      Parameters:
      userStatus - A map where keys are user IDs and values are booleans (true if new, false otherwise).
